_source.text: A female lecturer told me this was why women had to be better than men to get to the higher jobs in the modern science world, no longer is it to get noticed but more to keep the wolves away once you are there.

text: the modern science **world**, no longer is it to get noticed but more to **keep** the wolves **away** once you are there.
